description: graphite colored outer case with title in gray; book has lighter gray color with title in white-gray; contains pages with black and white photographic images of boats doctored and painted by the artist; contains loose inserts; also contains small insert with title and signature; bound volume; lenders archive #77
inscription: Inscribed in white paint on book cover: Notebook 1 Boats
markings: Numberedin black ink in inside back cover: 1/6
medium: Photographs and paint; bound volume Photographic reproductions and paint
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed:
Signed and dated in black ink on inside back cover: Carolyn Trant │2007
Signed and dated in pencil on loose slip inserted into book: Carolyn Trant │2007
title: The Falcon Bride – Boat Book
